Package data.automaton.definitions

Interface DFA

public interface DFA
An interface for a deterministic finite automaton DEA = (Q,X,d,s,A) with: Q a set of states X an alphabet d a transition function d: (Q x X) -> Q s in Q the start state A subset of Q the set of accepting states

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    accepts(String word)
    Returns whether or not the given word is in the language decided by this dfa.
    Set<String>

    Returns all words w with |w| = length and w in L(dfa).

    Returns all words w with |w| less or equal than length and w in L(dfa).

    • getInverseTransitionRelation

      Relation<BinaryTuple<State,Symbol>,State> getInverseTransitionRelation()
      Get the inverse transition relation (meaning for each ((q,s),p) in f -> ((p,s),q) in f-1) f being the transition function as a relation f-1 being the inverse relation
      Returns:
      the inverse transition relation.

    • accepts

      boolean accepts(String word)
      Returns whether or not the given word is in the language decided by this dfa.
      Parameters:
      word - word to check
      Returns:
      true if and only if this dfa accepts the word
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if word is null or not in A* (A being the ALphabet)

    • acceptsOfLength

      Set<String> acceptsOfLength(int length)
      Returns all words w with |w| = length and w in L(dfa).
      Parameters:
      length - the length of the words to get
      Returns:
      a set of words that are accepted by this dfa and are of size length

    • acceptsUntilLength

      Set<String> acceptsUntilLength(int length)
      Returns all words w with |w| less or equal than length and w in L(dfa).
      Parameters:
      length - the length limit of the words to get
      Returns:
      a set of words that are accepted by this dfa and are limited in size by length

    • isComplete

      boolean isComplete()
      Checks if this dfa is complete.
      Returns:
      true if and only if this dfa is complete
